item.title: Egoo Model Series DC EV Charger
item.description: Experience seamless EV charging with our advanced DC Charger, featuring compatibility, flexible output, weatherproof design, safety features, and customizable management.

item.title: Egoo Model Series AC EV Charger
item.description: Experience effortless, stylish charging with our smart station, featuring RFID card start, sleek design, customizable colors, smart mobile App integration, LCD display, and seamless Tesla compatibility.

item.title: Egoo AC EV Charging Adapter
item.description: Provides a variety of standard charging adapters

Key Features: Versatility: Our adapter caters to multiple scenarios, including J1772 to Tesla, Tesla to J1772, CCS1 to Tesla, CCS2 to GB/T, CCS2 to CCS1, and CCS1 to CCS2, ensuring compatibility across a wide range of electric vehicle models. Efficiency: Engineered for efficient power conversion, our adapter maximizes charging speeds while maintaining reliability and safety. Durable Construction: Crafted from high-quality materials, our adapter is built to withstand the rigors of daily use, ensuring longevity and durability.

Q: Can your adapter handle high-volume charging demands in commercial settings? A: Absolutely. Our adapter is engineered for versatility and efficiency, ensuring it can handle high-volume charging demands commonly found in commercial settings such as office complexes, shopping centers, and fleet depots. Q: How does your adapter ensure compatibility with different electric vehicle models used by our business fleet? A: Our adapter is designed to cater to various scenarios, including J1772 to Tesla, Tesla to J1772, CCS1 to Tesla, CCS2 to GB/T, CCS2 to CCS1, and CCS1 to CCS2.

Parameter J1772 to Tesla Tesla to J1772 CCS1 to Tesla CCS2 to GB/T Voltage 220-250V 110-250V 100-500V 250V AC Power Frequency 16A / 32A 48A 80-250A 32A IP Level IP54 IP65 IP54 IP54 Net Weight 175g 550g 650g 150g Product Dimensions 10cm x 6cm x 6cm 26cm x 11cm x 8cm 14.8cm x 10.7cm x 15.5cm 18.8cm x 7.5cm x 7.5cm

Key Features: Fast Charging: Our EV AC Charger delivers rapid charging speeds, ensuring your vehicle is ready to hit the road in no time. Compatibility: Compatible with a wide range of electric vehicles, making it versatile and adaptable to different models. Intelligent Charging: Equipped with intelligent technology to optimize charging efficiency and protect your vehicle’s battery. User-Friendly Interface: Easy-to-use interface allows for seamless operation, even for first-time users. Durable Construction: Constructed with high-quality materials for long-lasting durability and reliability.

Q: How fast can your EV AC Charger replenish the battery of my electric vehicle? A: Our EV AC Charger offers rapid charging speeds, with options for 7kW, 11kW, and 22kW, ensuring your vehicle is swiftly charged and ready for your next journey. Q: Is your charger compatible with various electric vehicle models used in our fleet? A: Yes, our charger is designed to be compatible with a wide range of electric vehicles, ensuring versatility and adaptability for diverse fleet requirements.

EV AC Charger unit DC Adapter for GB/T to CCS2, The charging current can reach 250A Temperature control work protection The materials are solid and the appearance is simple and elegant Supported models, longer use time Supported models: Tesla series, Changan series, GAC Trumpchi series, Geely series, BYD series, Volkswagen ID4/ID3, Xpeng series, Jikrypton series, Ideal series, etc DC Adapter for CCS2 to GB/T, The charging current can reach 300A Temperature control work protection The materials are solid and the appearance is simple and and elegant Built-in two 18650 batteries: Tesla series, BMW series, Mercedes-Benz EQ series, BYD series, MG series, Volvo series, Polestar series, Hyundai series, Kia series, etc

Why is it necessary for CCS2 to GB/T adapters to have built-in two 18650 batteries, while GB/T to CCS2 adapters do not require them? The built-in batteries in the CCS2 to GB/T adapter are solely utilized to power the adapter during software upgrades. Can I use your DC EV Charging Adapter in our commercial parking lots with different electric vehicle models? Absolutely. Our adapter is designed with versatility in mind, supporting both GB/T CCS2 and CCS2-GB/T options.

Parameter GB/T to CCS2 CCS2 to GB/T CHAdeMO to GB/T Item GB/T CCS2 Adapter CCS2-GB/T Adapter CHAdeMO-GB/T Adapter Model GB.T-CCS2 CCS2-GB/T CHADeMO-GB/T Output Current 250A Max 300A Max 125A Max Rated power 120kW 120KW 22kw Input Voltage 100-1000V 100-1000V 50-500V DC Enclosure type PA66+25% GF PA66+25% GF IP55 Output Detection Over Temperature Protection | Ground Protection Over Temperature Protection | Ground Protection None Operating Temperature -22°F to 122°F -22°F to 122°F -22°F to 122°F Operating Humidity 20%-85% 20%-85% 20%-85% Net wight 1.

This DC Charger offers a robust set of features tailored to meet the diverse needs of electric vehicle (EV) owners and charging station operators alike: Compatibility: Equipped with both CCS2 and GB/T connectors, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of electric vehicles, making it convenient for customers with different EV models. Flexible Output Range: With an output range of 80kW to 200kW and voltage compatibility from 150V to 1000V, this charging station is designed to accommodate both current and future EV technologies, ensuring that it can serve various EVs efficiently.

Q: How does your DC Charger accommodate different types of electric vehicles? A: Our DC Charger is equipped with both CCS2 and GB/T connectors, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of electric vehicles. Whether you have a Tesla, Nissan Leaf, BMW i3, or any other EV model, our charger can accommodate it. Q: What makes your charging station stand out in terms of safety features? A: Safety is paramount in our design.

Support Power 80KW / 120KW / 160KW / 200KW Input Voltage 400V±15% | 440V±15% | 480V±15% Input Voltage Typet TN-S Working Frequency 45~65Hz Power Factor ≥0.99 Efficiency ≥94% Rated Voltage CCS2 1000Vdc; GBT 1000Vdc Max Output Current CCS2 200A; GBT 250A Display 8"LCD Touch Screen Emergency Stop Button Yes Payment Mobile APP / RFID Network Connection 4G(GSM or CDMA) / Ethernet / WIFI Communication Protocols OCPP 1.6J Working Temperature -22°F to 122°F Storage Temperature -31°F to 131°F Operating Humidity ≤95% Non-Condensing Protection IP54 Acoustic Noise <65dB Cooling Method Forced Air-Cooling Dimension (W x D x H) 700mm x 590mm x 1840mm Cable Length 5m Certificate NTC CE / IEC61851-1 / IEC61851-23 / IEC61851-21-2 Charging Interface DIN70121 / DIN70122 / ISO15118

Key Features: Portable Design: It’s small and lightweight, easy to carry around for on-the-go charging of your electric car. Versatile Charging: Works with multiple electric car models, so it’s suitable for different brands and types of cars. Smart Charging Protection: Comes with built-in smart chips for protection against overcharging, overcurrent, overvoltage, and short circuits, ensuring safe charging. High Efficiency: It’s energy-efficient with fast charging speed, helping you save energy while charging up quickly.

Parameter American Standard European Standard Chinese Standard Model No P-EV01US-TYPE1 P-EV01EU-TYPE2 P-EV01CN-GBT Voltage 110V-250V 220V-250V 220V Adjustable Current 16A (8/10/13/16A) | 32A (16/20/24/32A) 16A (8/10/13/16A) | 32A (16/20/24/32A) 16A (8/10/13/16A) | 32A (16/20/24/32A) Power 3.5 KW | 7 KW 3.5 KW | 7 KW 3.5 KW | 7 KW User Interface LED indicator+LCD display(1.8 inch) LED indicator+LCD display(1.8 inch) LED indicator+LCD display(1.8 inch) Ingress Protection IP55 IP55 IP55 Environmental Temperature -22°F to 122°F -22°F to 122°F -22°F to 122°F Cable Length 5 meter 5 meter 5 meter

Key Features: Portable Design: It’s small and lightweight, easy to carry around for on-the-go charging of your electric car. Versatile Charging: Works with multiple electric car models, so it’s suitable for different brands and types of cars. Smart Charging Protection: Comes with built-in smart chips for protection against overcharging, overcurrent, overvoltage, and short circuits, ensuring safe charging. High Efficiency: It’s energy-efficient with fast charging speed, helping you save energy while charging up quickly.

How to charge Level 1: Standardized connector. At home using a normal wall outlet; cable included with car. Slow charge rate; 3-5 miles per hour. Useful for drivers travelling 40 miles or less daily; level 2 preferred if available. Level 2: Standardized connector. At home using a dedicated charging station. Medium charge rate; 15-30 miles per hour. Useful for drivers traveling 100+ miles daily. DC fast charging: Three connector types; CCS, CHAdeMO, Tesla.

Parameter EV16A01CN | EV32A01CN Model No EV16A01CN | EV32A01CN Adjustable Current 16A(8/10/13/16A) | 32A(16/20/24/32A) Power 3.5kw | 7kw Cable Specification 32.5mm+10.75mm | 36mm + 10.75mm Voltage 220V User Interface LED indicator + LCD display(2.4inch) Standard GB/T18487.1-2015 GB/T20234 GB/T 33594 Charging connector GB/T Plug +5M cable | custom cable length & color Product Dimensions EV plug: 2306554 mm Control Box: 21810060mm Ingress Protection Charging plug: 1P65 Control box: IP65 Environmental Temperature -35°C to 55°C Case Material Thermoplastic (flame retardant grade UL94-0) Ground Fault Detection 30mA for AC faults (Type A) | 30mA for AC and 6mA for DC faults (Type A + 6) Product Performance Over voltage protection.

item.title: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Market Analysis and Industry Overview
item.description: The EV charging market is booming, set to hit $328.6 billion by 2024 and $1040.9 billion by 2029, with a 25.94% annual growth. Despite COVID-19, it’s rebounding as economies reopen and governments promote EVs. Asia-Pacific, especially China and Japan, is crucial. Key players like State Grid Corporation of China and Siemens dominate, with advanced tech like wireless charging making strides.

item.title: This is How Much EV Charging The U.S. Will Need By 2030
item.description: The number of charging ports is expected to quickly increase, to support 33 million plug-ins.
